short_summary: Correctional Service of Canada has a requirement for ten (10) level 2 charging stations
description: The Correctional Service of Canada, Edmonton Institution, Edmonton Institution for Women, Grierson Institution, Pê Sakî Award Centre, and Regional Psychiatric Centre have a requirement for a total of ten (10) level 2 charging stations through Supply Arrangement E60HN-21EVSE
duration_in_months: For 30 days corresponding to aprox 1 month
tags: department of Correctional Service of Canada
full_summary:
================================Inspired Secure Electrical Vehicle Charging Infrastructure================================
============================== Tender Notice: Solicitation Number 21507-23-4584064 ===========================================

### Tender Overview

The Regional Headquarters Correctional Service Canada - Prairie Region invites suppliers to submit tenders for the delivery of [total of ten (10)](#ten) level 2 charging stations.

### Brief Description

The Correctional Service of Canada requires the acquisition of charging equipment for its correctional institutions, specifically:

* Level 2 electrical vehicle charging stations  
* Needed quantity: 10 units  
* Supply Arrangement E60HN-21EVSE is used for these procurements.  


### Tender Details

Below are the key details for your reference:

| Category | Details |
| --- | --- |
| **Title (English)** | Inspired Secure Electrical Vehicle Charging Infrastructure |
| **Title (French)** | Infrastructures de recharge électrique sécuritaire pour véhicules |
| **Reference Number** | CB-300-43054984 |
| **Amendment Number** | 2 |
| **Solicitation Number** | 21507-23-4584064 |
| **Publication Date** | 2024-03-04 |
| **Tender Closing Date** | 2024-03-18T16:00:00 |
| **Expected Contract Start Date** | 2024-04-01 |
| **Expected Contract End Date** | 2024-04-30 |

### Contract Description

Tenders will be opened until 2024-03-18T16:00:00, after which they will be evaluated. Suppliers must be registered and approved under the Industrial and Services Accords. A complete tender response, as per the guidelines provided on the link below, is required to be submitted electronically.

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33309/npp-21507-23-4584064-en_0.pdf
(English)
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33309/apm-21507-23-4584064-fr.pdf
(French)

Suppliers must include proof of registration and completion of the deliverables.

Looking for accountability and commitment to sustainable practices, especially when related to wheelchair-accessibility and zero waste is about.

### Points of Contact
